item.description:
$15; doors 7:30, concert 8:00
ImpresariaReservations@gmail.com

"Redfern applies the spiritual, ethereal feeling found in early mountain music...it's just a reminder of what real music is capable of when it's set free."
-Folk Roots

"Redfern is one to watch."
-Dirty Linen Magazine

For over two decades, Lisa Redfern’s music has brought joy and comfort to hundreds of thousands, from cradle to nursing home.

An award winning singer-songwriter, Lisa Redfern returned to her birth state of Maine, after 14 years in the San Francisco Bay area. With 8 solo recordings to her credit so far, she blends roots in folk, bluegrass, country, gospel, blues, jazz and swing to create something unmistakably her own. Lisa’s recordings have garnered positive critical review, extensive radio play and several TV appearances. She has added her clear, beautiful voice to dozens of other artists’ projects and song compilations. An opener for many notables, including Livingston Taylor, Dave Mallett & The Roches, she shared the stage with Pete Seeger, and appears locally each June in Dean Stevens’ Sweet Chariot Music Festival South at the Theodore Parker Church, West Roxbury, MA.

Artist information - http://www.lisaredfern.com/

IMPRESARIA Productions - https://sites.google.com/site/impresariaproductions/
item.name: Lisa Redfern
